annotations.description: Desert Door Texas Sotol is a distilled spirit from wild-harvested sotol plants. Hand-crafted in Driftwood, Texas. Are you ready for something mystical?
annotations.title: Desert Door Texas Sotol

textContent:
3 blackberries
4 basil leaves
.75 oz simple syrup
.75 oz lime
2 oz Sotol

Muddle berries and leaves with the syrup and lime
Shake with crushed ice
Open pour into collins glass
Garnish with blackberry and basil leaves
Top with soda water

https://www.desertdoor.com/
title: Yipping Coyote
